title: Nga Korero Hangarau - Te Orbital Temple
heading: Nga korero Hangarau

satellite.heading: Satellite
satellite.specs:
Rahi: 50x58x64 mm
1P PocketQube
Teina: 245 gr
Rauemi: konumohe, koura, muka karaihe, me nga waahanga hiko.
Orbit: Te teitei 525 ± 25 kiromita; whakahāngaitanga: SSO 97.6 ± 0.1°

antenna.heading: Antenna/Whakairo
antenna.specs:
Ahu: 6 m (diameter) e 1.2m (te teitei)
Taumaha: 46 kg
Rauemi: konumohe, he papa whakaata epoxy, he konumohe koura konumohe e whakatarewa ana i roto i te hanganga scaffolding.

radio.heading: Nga Waahanga Reo Irirangi NASA-Catalog:
radio.specs:
Hononga Raro TBD: 437 MHz
Waea: Tūnga: WHARE MO 2025
